import React from 'react'; import './IntroSubcopy.scss'; export default function IntroSubcopy() { return (

Strength can have many definitions. So, we asked three high achievers—in fitness and in life—what the word means to each of them. A central theme: It's not just about your body and your muscles. Mental tenacity and selfcare is equally important to any type of success.

A sense of meaning in life increases longevity.
- Review of General Psychology

But regardless of how you define the word, from where you derive strength is key. Your source of strength can be literal (think: dumbbells and resistance bands) or figurative (i.e. your mother, partner, or an activity that you do by yourself). Scroll down to hear what these three unique individuals consider sources of strength-and how you can benefit from each of their personal experiences.

) }
